meanings.sent1: Her insecureness made it hard for her to speak up in class.
meanings.sent2: His insecureness often led him to doubt his own abilities.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's insecureness around the big dog was quite evident.
meanings.sent4: The insecureness in her voice revealed her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds of insecureness hovered over her mind, blocking out any positivity.

meanings.sent1: The hiker's insecureness about the steep trail made him turn back.
meanings.sent2: The insecureness of the bridge's structure was a cause for concern.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's insecureness about crossing the busy road was comical to watch.
meanings.sent4: The insecureness of the old building was like a ticking time bomb.
meanings.sent5: The insecureness of the ship in the storm was palpable, causing fear among the crew.
